Subject: Re: At our allies base
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster grabs the can and pours half of it in his houlder compartment,
he then hands it to Killfest. "This cybertronian act has never been broken
by and Autobot, we will not break it either. It represents us as comrades
in arms. It honors the help you gave us." He extends his hand in a hand
shake. "Call us, and we will deal, we know you are trustworthy." he speaks.
